title: The Drought : Digital Storytelling project
brief_description: Ten farmers from the north-eastern region of Victoria reflect upon their lives within the context of one of the longest and most severe droughts the region has ever seen. In doing so, they highlight the things that have kept them there, whether it be family, community or the love of farming.
